channel.title: How do you make the login transparent?
channel.description: I remember there being a tut on how to make that ugly rs login box transparent so you could see your custom background does anyone have that tut I'm having a hard time finding it.

item.title: How do you make the login transparent?
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

yeah the color is r:255 b:255 g:255 or #FFFFFF or AS white as possible

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make the login transparent?

item.title: How do you make the login transparent?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

I think it doesnt work as simply as it sounds. I think there is some sort of algorithm that is assosciated with transparency on the client.
